name: Antattack
description:
ANTATTACK is a tower defense game in which you have to trigger your towers by yourself, using your keyboard.

You can try to play this tower defense game as you would any other, but beware of the amount of attention each tower will require from you.

In this particular game, placing LESS towers will effectively be  MORE efficient.

This game was made for the Blackthornprod GAME JAM #3 based on the theme: Less is More.
It has been made from scratch, in a week, by DeathBiscuitt, MaxGames and Avace. We hope you enjoy playing our game as much as we enjoyed making it. :D

EDIT: We just realised that a sprite is missing, but don't worry you should never notice it since it is part of the Lose screen !
